tool_description: The Oscar API is a RESTful API that provides detailed information about the winners and nominees of the Academy Awards ceremony, year by year. This API offers an extensive database of Oscar Awards, including all categories of nominees and winners.
title: Oscar API

api_list.name: Get Awards by Year
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves the list of awards presented in a given year. It returns a list of objects, where each object represents an award category and includes the name of the award and the nominees and winner(s) for that category.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://oscar-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/oscar/awards/{year}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "oscar-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
